    • addToBasket

      public void addToBasket()
      Adds the current drink to the basket. Displays the drink's specific selections and modifications to the drink in the basket label. Calculates and displays the price of the customized drink and updates.
      Parameters:
      None -

    • addToOrder

      public void addToOrder()

    • findMenuID

      public int findMenuID(String itemName, Database db)
      Finds the menu ID in the database corresponding to a chosen item.
      Parameters:
      itemName - the name of the chosen menu item.
      db - the database connection object.
      Returns:
      the menuID from the database or -1 if not found

    • updateIngredient

      public void updateIngredient(String ingredientName, Float quantityAmt, Database db)
      Updates the inventory for a specific ingridient after an order is placed.
      Parameters:
      ingredientName - the name of the ingridient being made.
      quantityAmt - the quantity of the ingridient being used.
      db - the database connection object.

    • updateInventory

      public void updateInventory(Drink drink)
      Updates the inventory for all ingridients used in a drink and it chosen modifications.
      Parameters:
      drink - the customized drink whose ingridients will be updated.

    • placeOrder

      public void placeOrder()
      Attempts to place the order to finalize the payment. Updates the inventory, and adds the order to the database invalid input: '&' Z report.
      Parameters:
      None -

      public void logOut()
      Logs out the current user and returns the view to the login screen.
